name: Who's the Boss? (LeftOut, hasteovertrample, thomasohashi, jirapher)
name_original: Who's the Boss? (LeftOut, hasteovertrample, thomasohashi, jirapher)
description:
Do you love being a little monster baby?  Just a wee little monster child jumpin' and stuff? Getting slain for loot?  You like being a little baby monster getting slain for loot and only dropping a tiny sword and some monster gold? Yeah, do you? Is that a thing you like doing?

Controls

  • WASD: Move
  • Space: Jump
  • P: Pause

*Gamepads supported
